#summary Shopping List Activity.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The shopping list activity shows your shopping list and allows you to tick off items as they go in the trolley.


= Details =

Ingredients are automatically added for [RecipeEdit recipes] in the [MealPlannerList meal planner] and miscellaneous ingredients can be added manually. When you are shopping you can simply click on an item on the shopping list to add it to the trolley and strike it out.

== Menu Options ==

|| *Menu Option* || *Description* ||
|| Finish Shopping || Add all items that are in the trolley to your [Inventory inventory] and delete them from the shopping list||
